content: The 26th of September is the European Day of Languages. The Council of Europe wants to draw attention to the multilingual heritage of Europe, to foster the evolution of multilingualism in society and to encourage citizens to learn languages​​. Tatoeba, as an easy-to-use learning tool and an active community, promotes the study and appreciation of languages in a very practical way.
translations: ita:Il 26 settembre è la Giornata Europea delle Lingue. Il Consiglio d'Europa vuole aumentare la consapevolezza del patrimon
